title: [Update: Maybe not] Samsung will reportedly launch a new foldable device codenamed “Diamond” later this year
content:
Samsung currently offers two types of foldable smartphones as part of its Galaxy Z Fold and Galaxy Z Flip lineups. But the company is reportedly planning to launch a third type of foldable device this year. Rumor has it that Samsung is working on a new foldable phone with a unique form factor, which should

The post [Update: Maybe not] Samsung will reportedly launch a new foldable device codenamed “Diamond” later this year appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung will reportedly launch a third-type of foldable smartphone later this year, which could feature a rollable/slideable OLED panel.
